title: Rebirth of the Pampered Wife’s Daily Life - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Age Regression   Beautiful Female Lead   Books   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Clever Protagonist   Cute Story   First Love   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Polite Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Second Chance   Showbiz   Time Skip   Wealthy Characters
author: 城南花开
description:
In his last life, Xu Lang was God’s favored business genius, and Xia Teng was a powerful movie queen with enough black materials to fill the sky.

The two’s intersection was merely at a banquet.

Returning as a senior in high school, Xu Lang found that underneath the cover of a Venus flytrap was actually something so fragile.>
